data.title: Park City, UT
data.text:
LATEST NEWS

Summer Try Transit Week

Join us for a week full of transit events! Here is the daily schedule:

Monday (8/26): Kickoff the week with the start of Ride On, a virtual event that lasts the whole week. Log your transit, carpool, and biking trips for a chance to win amazing rewards. Visit www.RideOnParkCity.org to get started.

Tuesday (8/27): Join us at PC MARC from 2:00 - 4:00 p.m. for a fun and active afternoon of free yoga, pickleball, and giveaways. Stay tuned for more details.

Wednesday (8/28): Donâ€™t miss "Talk Transit with the Mayor and Council" at the Fresh Market bus stop from 4:30 - 5:30 p.m. Enjoy refreshments, popsicles, music, and a chance to chat with the mayor and city council members. We look forward to seeing you there!

Thursday (8/29): Swing by our Transit booth from 4:30 - 5:30 p.m. for free snacks, refreshments, and swag. Location is to be determined.

Friday (8/30): It's a bird... it's a plane... it's Music on the Bus! Take transit on Friday for a chance to see a local musician playing live music on the bus.

Follow us on social media @ParkCityTransit for the latest Try Transit Week information.

The 20 Tan: Park City Transit's Newest Route

On July 1st, Park City Transit launched a new route, the 20 Tan, which serves the Park Meadows and Royal Street neighborhoods. Due to the pilot nature of this project, transit stop poles in the upper Park Meadows area will not be present. Instead, riders can wave down the bus anywhere along its route in Park Meadows.

Click here for route and time point info. Download the Transit App to track Park City Transit buses, view upcoming departure times, and plan your trip.

Upcoming Bus Stop Improvements

This summer, we're kicking off a major project to improve bus stops across Park City! Our goal is to enhance ADA access and add new amenities at 72 stops over the next few years. Phase 1 construction begins this summer, which will improve 19 stops in our community.
